concept.display: Skin phototype I (always burn, never tan) (finding)
Skin phototype II (initially always burn, then usually tan) (finding)
Skin phototype III (initially sometimes burn, then usually tan)
Skin phototype IV (rarely burn, then always tan) (finding)
